info.title: Games API
info.description:
This is a Swagger UI for our Games API.

Error handling:
Errors are presented using the HTTP status codes 400-599. The response includes a more detailed explanation about the error in the body.
Example error response:
{
  "error": "Cleartext explanation of the error that occurred"
}

Generic API errors:
HTTP status 400: Bad input parameters or invalid request.
HTTP status 401: The consumer does not have access to the requested resource or the provided token is not valid.
HTTP status 404: The requested resource cannot be found or the user does not have access to it.
HTTP status 5XX: A server error has occurred while processing the request.
